item.title: TryHackMe - W1seGuy
item.author: mohamed.anaddam@outlook.com (azadin)
item.description: A w1se guy 0nce said, the answer is usually as plain as day. Title W1seGuy Description A w1se guy 0nce said, the answer is usually as plain as day. Points 60 Difficulty Easy Maker DrGonz0, hadrian3689 Summary TryHack3M: Bricks Heist, in this machine we exploit a vulnerable theme in wordpress, this gets us an anuthenticated RCE, once in, we look around to investigate the heist case, through a suspecious service to finding the suspects behind it.
item.dc:creator: azadin

item.title: TryHackMe - TryHack3M: Bricks Heist
item.author: mohamed.anaddam@outlook.com (azadin)
item.description: Crack the code, command the exploit! Dive into the heart of the system with just an RCE CVE as your key. Title TryHack3M: Bricks Heist Description Crack the code, command the exploit! Dive into the heart of the system with just an RCE CVE as your key. Points 180 Difficulty Easy Maker umairalizafar, 403Exploit Summary TryHack3M: Bricks Heist, in this machine we exploit a vulnerable theme in wordpress, this gets us an anuthenticated RCE, once in, we look around to investigate the heist case, through a suspecious service to finding the suspects behind it.
